Stand at the ONLY ENTRANCE to the area. Hearts beating ha and fast. Knowing McCall is here. Using hand signals MASTERS points Pederson and Buddy down separate aisles.
Every step painful. Bile and dread inching up their throa Finally reaching the...
FOUNTAINS, BIRDBATHS and WIND CHIMES. Against the back wa ALL kinds of PLANTING SUPPLIES.
Against the back wall in the shadows. Just the whites of eyes visible. Standing amongst the garden TOOLS and a row STEEL WHEELBARROWS.  92.
HEARS that TICKING SOUND. FIRES a SHOT blindly into the shadows.
Waits. Like a cobra. All three Men stepping into range. CAMERA pans down McCall’s body to his hand. Garage Door remote in it. Finger over the clicker.

Taking three steps closer. Then they HEAR it. Eyes fallin on the wheelbarrow as it lowers over the kneeling body of McCall. Exchange confused looks. And at the exact same time realizing they're surrounded b LUMPY bags of FERTILIZER. EMPTY BOXES OF NAILS scattered across the floor.
Pushes the Clicker on the Remote as...
Have just enough time to exchange one stupid look before.
FERTILIZER BAGS EXPLODING. Nails SCREAM through the air a the speed of sound. High pitched WHINES as the projectile literally nail...
Faces and bodies riddled with the nails. Muscles, tendons and bone cut to pieces. Organs punctured and shredded.  93.
Nails THUNK and PIERCE the steel like quills. Stopping inches from McCall's body.
Barely alive. Bleeding from places he didn’t know could bleed. Stumbling to his feet. SEEING his dead Partners.
Knees pumping like out-of-sync pistons. RACING towards th BACK OF THE STORE.

Everyone in the cage frozen in fear. Except Ralphie. He’s furiously working on his tie wraps. Almost gets them loose enough when Masters gun barrel sli through the fence and touches his forehead. Bloody face appearing against the chain link...
Everything bathed in murky darkness. Nothing moves. The unearthly silent is shattered by...

The animalistic cry ECHOES throughout the cavernous store Then Ralphie appears out of the shadows. BARREL OF MASTERS REVOLVER DUCT-TAPED TO HIS TEMPLE... Masters PRESSED UP against Ralphie’s back. DUCT TAPE WEAV

head_text.subj: ITS WAY AROUND HIS GUN HAND. COVERING HIS FINGER ON THE

text: The only thing visible is the COCKED HAMMER... MASTERS (CONT’D)
HICCUP HE’S DEAD! UNDERSTAND???  94. Ralphie’s eyes squeezed tight. Barely holding it together In his trembling hand is a bolt cutter. Price tag still attached. MASTERS (CONT’D)

head_text.subj: I'M WALKING OUT OF HERE NOW

text: Somewhere in the darkness. Eyes studying the impossible. Baretta M9. 4 pounds of pull making it a hair trigger for all intent and purpose. Duct tape masking the exact posit of the trigger finger... Reaches down and grabs the long barrel M16-A out of Russi 4's dead hand. Flips on the LASER SCOPE. Takes a breath.. And steps back into the darkness...
At the FRONT ENTRANCE. Bicycle Chain the only thing betwe Masters and freedom.

Cut it. Ralphie’s sweat covered hands fumble with the cutters. Masters pressing the barrel harder into the kid’s temple. Ralphie manages to cut one length of the chain. Places th teeth of the cutters over the last piece. Masters eyes DART INTO THE DARKNESS OF THE STORE. No McCa Eerie and way too quiet. Then SEES the FAINT GLOW of RED coming from the far aisle... Looks down... LASER DOT ACROSS THE DUCT TAPE where is hand would be... Masters JERKS RALPHIE around! SPINNING HIM SO THE DOT IS HIS CHEST... MASTERS (CONT’D)
Right next to Masters ear.
It look like I'm kidding?
Propped up on a shelf all by itself at the end of the ais

Masters’ eyes GO WIDE as McCall’s arm snaps around his ne Masters squeezing the trigger... But nothing happens. Masters’ confused. Looks down and SEES THE CARPET KNIFE JAMMED INTO THE HOLLOW OF HIS TRICEP.

Brachial tendon’s severed, Slick. You got nothing from the shoulder down... Box Cutter slices the barrel from Ralphie’s head. Ralphie falling to his knees. McCall twisting the dead arm toward Masters chest.
So let me help you. McCall touches Master’s finger. The Gun FIRES a single MUFFLED SHOT into Master’s heart.

Masters dead before he hits the floor. McCall reaches dow and takes the keys from his belt. Walks over to Ralphie. Helps him to his feet. Shock and awe plastered all over Ralphie’s face. Staring McCall like he was some apparition. McCall drops the keys the Cage and a pair of pliers into Ralphie’s hand.
You should go let them out.  96. Ralphie nods.

I don’t know if you heard. I’m away on a family matter. I’11 be back Monday. A LONG beat. Then Ralphie smiles. INT. TEDDY’S CAR - BOAT BASIN Teddy getting in. Tossing the Shotgun into the back seat when his Cell RINGS. UNKNOWN NUMBER appears on the screen Answers and HEARS...
Run.

A glass and steel modern structure with spiraled columns designed to support nothing except public awe and reveren Teddy coming out of the Bank pocketing AN ENVELOPE. Hits remote. About to climb in when HE SEES... TWO suit-clad MEN on the near corner. Eyes directly on Teddy. Now SEES another TWO MEN on the far corner. Looks across the street... FOUR MORE MEN in SUITS. ALL looking at Teddy.
Agent Coleman... Teddy spins. TWO DARK BLUE SUITS, matching haircuts and implacable faces behind him. Agency ID’s in their hands.
Special Agent Ward. This is Agent Miller. CIA Internal Affairs.
Miller behind the wheel. Ward shotgun. Teddy behind the chicken wire screen in the back.  97. Hands cuffed behind his back.
Tip of Manhattan. Down Battery Place then taking a DETOUR Crossing Water Street. The sedan jumps down a one lane di road that cuts a swath through a path of dense foliage.
Teddy looking around. SEES the CITY being swallowed up by the overgrown TREES...
Where the fuck we going?
Road getting smaller, foliage thicker. Rusted out boat trailers litter the shoulder. We're at the abandoned Boat Basin.

Through the windshield foliage clears and the Harbour com into VIEW. The car bumps along a bit further then stops a few yards above the water line. Miller and Ward exit the vehicle without a word leaving T alone. After what seems like an eternity the drivers side door o and McCall slides in. McCall doesn’t turn around.
It was your idea to meet here. Now shifts so he can look directly at Teddy.
It’s important you understand everything.  98.
I understand enough.
I don’t think you do. A long pause. McCall lowers the back windows a few inches

The place we choose to inhabit, to live our lives, is like it’s own ecosystem. Ecosystems only survive when there’s balance. Otherwise there’s chaos, corruption and injustice. (beat) People like you upset that balance.
What the fuck are you talking about? It was bad guys killing worse guys. You don’t think that exists every fucking place in the world?
It does. I’ve seen it. But you’re in my world. And that’s... unacceptable.

Wake up you self-righteous prick. The whole cake’s been divided down to the last crumb. You take what you can get when you can get it. (beat) I didn’t design the system. I simply learned how to play it and win it. (beat) I got seven million dollars in my pocket. It’s yours. Take it. Dole it out to your ecosystem McCall cracks the front windows. Stares out at the water a few moments.
Most people don’t want anything except fairness. (MORE )

More and more they feel they can never have it. They see bigger, richer, more corrupt, morally bankrupt, spiritually vacant people get it all. The ones who don’t give a shit... Turns the ignition key halfway. Engine light coming on. Turns around and starts going through Teddy's pocket.

You’re a bad guy, Teddy. Worse, you're a bad guy who doesn’t give a shit. About anyone. Even yourself. And that makes you more frightening than almost any monster out there. McCall finds the check. Sits back and looks at the amount Whistles. T eddy laughs.

Lot of money. Don’t be so smug. In my ecosystem I’1l do four years in some country club prison, get out, move to Dubai. Sell my knowledge and services to some Sheik who likes the idea of having an ex-CIA Agent on his staff. In two years, I'll be a millionaire all over again.
